trait.name: Helpful
entries: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a {@dice 1d6} bonus to the {@dice d20} roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack's damage roll against un objectiu.

trait.name: Tools
entries: The expert has {@item thieves' tools|phb} and a musical instrument.

action.name: Extra Attack
entries: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the {@action Attack} action on its turn.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Healer)
headerEntries: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Potent Cantrip
entries: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent if used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Mage)
headerEntries: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Potent Cantrip
entries: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent if used with two hands.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The statue makes five attacks: one with its headbutt and four with its lightning bolt blades.

action.name: Headbutt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Lightning Bolt Blades
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Tooth-N-Claw
languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Tooth-N-Claw exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de fred on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
entries: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Martial Role
entries: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:

items.name: Attacker
items.entry: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

items.name: Defender
items.entry: The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

action.name: Extra Attack
entries: The warrior can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the {@action Attack} action on its turn.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Protection (Defender Only)
entries: The warrior imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn't the warrior. The warrior must be able to see the attacker.
